hero.core_tension: Choose between broad percent-off volumes and targeted collab events during a short early-holiday capture window.
hero.setting: Store backroom staged as a studio pop-up with a wall map of stores, event posters, and a pegboard of partner SKUs.
hero.action: Placing a collab-event sticker on a two-week pilot map while directing staff on timing and inventory allocation.
hero.urgency_symbol: A narrow band of light slicing across stacked ticket-stub silhouettes to imply finite slots.
props: two-week pilot store map labeled control, blanket-discount, collab-event
collab posters referencing 'Holiday windows are deal-hungry'
price-curve sketch pinned near sample SKUs
hero.lighting: Polished editorial with confident highlights and clean negative space
hero.alt: Head of Retail staging a two-week collab event pilot to lift early-window share.

signal_map.structure: Concentric rings and radial arcs; inner ring shows baseline, outer ring shows stretch targets; nodes connect stores to event types.
elements: store tokens sized by weekly footfall
collab nodes highlighted with bold accent
discount nodes rendered as neutral tokens
signal_map.motion: Curved flows indicate buyer movement from awareness to in-store activity; thicker paths encode higher lift.
signal_map.palette: Matte neutrals with a single confident accent for collab nodes, metallic accents for measurement labels
signal_map.alt: Head of Partnerships reviews a signal map encoding footfall lift and early-window share for collab tests.

case_studies.scene: Floor-level pilot day with staff prepping a collab pop-up; nearby a small wall chart shows day-by-day early-window share.
case_studies.moment: First morning of a randomized two-week pilot where collab-event stores open an exclusive bundle.
props: stacked bundle packs branded with partner logo
paper log for daily early-window share metrics
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial, directional highlights on the pop-up
case_studies.alt: Retail Ops Manager running a randomized two-week pilot testing collab events vs blanket discounts.

case_studies.scene: Small strategy session around a table with a printed price-curve and partner sample boxes; a staff member pins QR-redemption targets.
case_studies.moment: Deploying price-curve optimization on collaboration inventory and tagging items with event-only QR codes.
props: QR code redemption tags attached to samples
partner activation checklist labeled 'store-as-studio / media-led holiday'
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial, crisp side light for texture
case_studies.alt: Head of Pricing deploying a price-curve test on collab inventory to lower event CPA and boost QR redemption.

case_studies.scene: After-action display that reads as resolved: sold tags, redeemed QR strips, and a tidy stack of partner invoices with margin notes.
case_studies.moment: End of pilot where collab-led stores exceed early-window share goals and event CPA sits below ceiling.
props: printed metric cards showing footfall lift and early-window share
redeemed QR stubs forming a ribbon of redeemed actions
compact partner value ledger with margin-preservation notes
case_studies.lighting: Polished editorial, confident highlights that emphasize positive outcomes
case_studies.alt: Head of Partnerships confirming collab model hit 25% footfall lift and met early-window share targets.
